What the fuck did I just watch, cod sucks anyway glad they ruined the series even more

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Frell:

Well I play a very wide assortment of games and I don’t devote myself to call of duty anymore (or many console games for that matter) so id say my opinion is less biased and therefore more credible.

No game is ‘better’ than the other as its an opinion, face palm. Games can be more efficient than others and so forth but there is none that is better than the other. Its like art, what makes a certain piece better than another? I feel like I’m my old primary school teacher…

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

Maybe you prefer blackops rather than mw3 cause your better at blackops than mw3? Rather than you saying that it is possible I can imagine you’ll deny it.

It doesn’t really make sense that I can be consistently good at 4/World at War/Black Ops, yet be so horrible at the two previous Modern Warfare games considering they’re all practically the same exact game with the same exact gameplay. A better explanation would be it’s something in those two games that is technically different from the others, which affects the way I play.

Besides, those two games in general just have things I highly dislike included in them, along with having horrible maps (Modern Warfare 3 easily has the worst maps out of any of the games I’ve played thus far).

Read full topic

but then i went back the campaign
the campaign is short tho and kinda stupid
it doesn’t last more than maybe a hour and half

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Tried to pop in 4 yesterday, was stuck at the loading screen for 10 minutes (where you can select what type of online match your playing) and just gave up. Then put in mw2 and went 15-1 on my first game in over a year which I joined halfway through. That wouldn’t happen in cod 4

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Frell:

and you disagree that it was fucking amazing and the best memories you ever had?

No, it was a good game. But your stating something thats wrong… Your saying your opinion/perception of the game is a fact when its not. I dislike it when people do that, they say something is bad because they don’t like it etc. Makes them sound like they think there opinion is the centre of the universe.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:67, topic:441154”]Tico and I went back to Black Ops a while ago. I don’t know what they changed in Modern Warfare 3 to make it so horrible, and unbalanced, but it’s just a pain to play. I’ve felt the same way with both of the last two Modern Warfare games, something needs to happen there.

In comparison for myself, I only have like 1.64 wlr and 1.21 kdr in Modern Warfare 3, compared to 2.11 wlr and 1.80 kdr in Black Ops. Black Ops is just so much more fun and easier to play for some reason.[/quote]
Maybe you prefer blackops rather than mw3 cause your better at blackops than mw3? Rather than you saying that it is possible I can imagine you’ll deny it.

[quote=“casey., post:68, topic:441154”]In the end, nothing will ever compete with COD4.

The only reason I bought black ops was for zombies and mw3 was for infected.[/quote]
its an opinion, its not a fact so don’t talk about it like its a fact.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Tico and I went back to Black Ops a while ago. I don’t know what they changed in Modern Warfare 3 to make it so horrible, and unbalanced, but it’s just a pain to play. I’ve felt the same way with both of the last two Modern Warfare games, something needs to happen there.

In comparison for myself, I only have like 1.64 wlr and 1.21 kdr in Modern Warfare 3, compared to 2.11 wlr and 1.80 kdr in Black Ops. Black Ops is just so much more fun and easier to play for some reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Black Ops and MW3 are very different games… thats why. I’m like a 0.5kdr on black ops(I don’t own it to be fair) but usually 1.5+ kdr on mw3 when I don’t lag my tits off so that alone just shows you play the game differently.

I don’t like blackops, I like mw3. Very different games;p.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops 2
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Chassy13:

Black Ops is still more fun to play than Modern Warfare 3. I tried playing MW3 yesterday, couldn’t make it past 20 minutes. I’ve had the game since day of release and I’m still like level 32. I had a weird urge to play BO last night but couldn’t find it, so I popped in RDR instead!

Same but I’m level 4.

I find mw2 a lot of fun though
